body_html:
@alexskates We actually need Command Line Tools from Xcode 8.2 (macOS 10.12) to build PyTorch with CUDA on macOS. The correct steps should be:

  1. Install Command Line Tools from Xcode 8.2 (macOS 10.12) from https://download.developer.apple.com/Developer_Tools/Command_Line_Tools_macOS_10.12_for_Xcode_8.2/Command_Line_Tools_macOS_10.12_for_Xcode_8.2.dmg

  2. Set export DEVELOPER_DIR=/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools, then run MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 NO_CUDA=0 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install to build PyTorch.
